notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the Umbria region (Rural Development Program 2014–2020—Measure 16. Cooperation, Sub-Measure 16.2.2 (Support for pilot projects, and for the development of new— Focus Area prevention and management of farm risk) and by the “Departments of Excellence-2018” Program (Dipartimenti di Eccellenza) of the Italian Ministry of Education, University and Research, DIBAF-Department of University of Tuscia, Project “Landscape 4.0—food, wellbeing and environment”.
